entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3 with temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy late this evening with 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3 with temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 5 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 5. POP 30%
